project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches and displays current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Set up project environment and dependencies
Implement the function to fetch weather data from the public API
Implement function to parse and display weather data (temperature, humidity, conditions)
Write tests to validate the functionality of fetching and displaying weather data
Execute tests to ensure all functionalities work as expected
